page.title: 18COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: We are served by 12 post offices in our densely populated area of (South) Sunderland.11 of these are sub. P.O. situated in a main thoroughfare of the town centre's pedestrian precinct.The public have made many requests for an improved queueing service system in most P.O.We consider that sub.P.O. are distributed evenly throught our area. We calculated that the greatest distance anyone has to travel from home to a P.O. to be 800m.We are served by 35 Post Boxes.We consider these to have an even spread of distribution.There is a letter/parcel sorting office in the town centre which is situated 400m from the town's Railway Station.The present telephone Nos/code for the N.E. are at present being converted to the prefix 091.
